attributes.action: Create a standard rate for council tax throughout the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unreasonable to expect people to pay a higher rate of council tax just because they happen to live in an extravegent borough. Taxation should be equal across the whole of the UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
